result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lisa E. Krueger

defendant.name: Krueger, Lisa E.
defendant.address: W6292 Rueff Road, Middle Inlet, WI 54177

records.addlTxt:
1:41 PM Defendant Lisa E. Krueger in court.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Lisa E. Krueger.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Atty Hansen provides plea form.
ADA heard on agreement.
Atty Hansen agrees.
Court arraigns Deft on Count 1.
Deft enters a plea of guilty.
Non-citizen advisory.
No firearms.
May not vote or serve on jury until civil rights are restored.
PleaQuest/WOR.
Constitutional rights.
Elements of offense.
Read-ins.
Deft understands.
Court reviews prior convictions.
Deft agrees.
Atty Hansen satisfied.
Factual basis.
Court finds Deft enters plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; therefore court accepts plea and finds Deft guilty to Count 1.
Court dismisses and reads-in Count 2.
Court dismisses outright Count 3.
Court orders presentence investigation be completed.  
Agent to provide report to court at least 2 weeks prior to sentencing. 
Atty Hansen heard on moving directly to sentencing.
Court heard and denies request.
Court speaks to deft.
Deft understands.
1:56 off record.
1:57 back on record.
Court schedules with parties.
Court orders deft to cooperate with the PSI process.
Deft remanded into the custody of the Marinette County Sheriff Dept.
1:58 PM
Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 08:00 am.

3:04 PM 
Defendant Lisa E. Krueger in court.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Lisa E. Krueger.  Attorney Kathryn Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court heard on count #3 being added
ADA confirms it was added 
Copy of info
Waives reading
Pleads n/g
Requests STC 
3:06PM
Status conference scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

3:10 PM Prosecuting attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Lisa E. Krueger in court.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Lisa E. Krueger. 
Prelim quest/WOR provided
Def waives prelim
Court finds def freely waives prelim
Def bound over for trial 
3:14PM
Arraignment scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

10:07 AM Defendant Lisa E. Krueger in court.  Attorney Robert J Mraz in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Hansen appears in court.
Court calls case.
Copy of complaint.
Atty Hansen heard - has reviewed complaint with deft.
Deft understands charges and penalties.
Waives formal reading.
Requests prelim.
Deft waives time limits.
Court schedules with parties.
10:10 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Order For Defendant To Abstain from Alcohol And For Testing

03:30 PM Defendant Lisa E. Krueger in court, in custody.  Kathryn E Heineck appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Lisa E. Krueger appeared by video means.
Court calls case.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
Court reviews charges and maximum penalties.
Court inquires on Atty.
ADA heard on bond recommendations.
Deft heard.
Court imposes $500 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid Rx, no operating a motor vehicle without a valid license, Compliance with Soberlink, Deft may sell alcohol at place of employment.
Deft to contact the Public Defenders office today.
Court schedules.
3:35 PM
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
